fullplot: Mikiko "Kuromi" Oguro lands her dream job at an animation studio. When she gets there however, the Head of Production manager dies shortly after meeting her and therefore passes his position onto her. She must now summon the lazy staff to complete "Time Journeys" in one week.

title: Animation Runner Kuromi
